info.name: Hexagonally Grouped Triangle DDA
info.description: Proof-of-concept: implementation of a triangle DDA as special case of a voxel DDA, by stepping through the voxels along the plane orthogonal to the main diagonal (1,1,1) and then grouping the triangles to hexagons (added hexagonal function to original).
info.parentname: Triangle DDA via Voxel DDA Slice
